mapper.update: update justyou.task set traffic=traffic+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.`id`,t.`recruiting_number`,t.`release_time`,t.`traffic`,t.`task_title`, c.`class_id`,c.`describe`,c.`Picture`,c.`name`,u.user_name,u.user_id,u.open_id,t.task_description,tag.tag_id,tag.tag_name from justyou.task `t`,justyou.task_classification `c`, `user` u , task_set_tag tst,tag tag where t.class_id=c.class_id and u.user_id=t.user_id and t.id=tst.task_id and tst.tag_id=tag.tag_id and t.state=0 and start_time < DATE_SUB(now(),interval 60 second)
select class_id, `name` from justyou.task_classification order by sort asc
